projects.title: BoomTech
shortdescription: Personal portfolio static site built with React
- Responsive design using Sass, CSSGrid, and Flexbox

subsections.title: Brief
information: - Front End Development of portfolio site built using data from JSON files, using React.
- Designed of my own brand and a platform for my brand,

- A site to share my skills, and experience, showcase my work, and for those interested to easily reach me. A convenient way for clients, future employers, and co-workers to get more insight about myself, beyond the resume.

subsections.title: Front End Features
information: - Developed reusable, presentational, and state driven  user interface components.
- Utilized React Router
- Programmed SVG Animations and assets, and implemented animated interactive and on scroll components.
- Dynamically generated components based on JSON file data.
- Responsive design utilizing CSS Grid, Flexbox, and Sass.
Higher Order Components
Image Zoom Modal Component
- Front End Optimization
- Made Use of SEO, Optimization, and Bundling features of React Static by Nozzle

subsections.title: Graphic Design Process and Features
information: - Created a brand design that I can have fun with and animate while expressing an explosive impact.
- Responsive logo and wordmark that I may use for print and web to promote the brand and platform, as well deliver a consistent and professional look
- SVG Animation to animate the logo and supporting assets on the site with responsive design in mind.

projects.title: Beast1x5
shortdescription: Wordpress Blog Theme and Plugins to support Video Game related content, Twitch Broadcasting, and Youtube Videos
projects.techKeywords: Wordpress, PHP, MySQL, Twitch API, Youtube API, Bootstrap, Docker

subsections.title: Brief
information: Custom dynamic wordpress theme for Twitch channel host with extended features for advertisements, logo customizations, blog features, Twitch status updates, Twitch chat, and Youtube based post generation. Extended user specific features and brand elements via custom child theme. User also required promotional material to support the brand.

subsections.title: Process
information: - Created plugin to generate posts using CORS to schedule querying youtube for new video content for user's Youtube Channel
- Created theme to support Twitch based streaming and youtube

Since the client was an active twitch host and had a robust collection of video game related video content available on his Youtube page, it was a core principle to seek to tie these two together on a single site.

- The scope of the project extended to supporting blog content since the client also is active in related hobbies, such as vaping, traveling to arcades in Japan, created music content, held a collection of video game material, and other personal content that would share the interets of the same audience.

-The current supported logo, was in need of refactor, and my first iteration to the site required a different approach that utilized Wordpress's features, as well as make it adoptable by other interested clients, or allow the client to scale his own in the future. I went about strategizing how content may be organized, easily edited, and updated, and what required dynamic elements.

- Planned how to best use the Youtube API, and implement communication between the site and the Twitch API endpoint for realtime status updates and chat accessibility.I also needed to recreate the brand and add a professional look to the channel host that would assist in generating a larger audience. I added Ad Space to the theme to in turn to generate revenue and in turn help keep the site active as users visited the site. Search Engine Optimization techniques were applied to further extend the reach for the site.

subsections.title: Current Project Status
information: Project was placed on hold but the theme and site will be accessible soon, so please follow or feel free to contact to stay up to date.

projects.title: Match-Up
shortdescription: Application for fighters and gym owners to conveniently find sparring partners and schedule sparring
projects.techKeywords: React Native, iOS, Android, Redux, Firebase, Python

subsections.title: Brief
information: As a gym owner or a fighter the user would like to find sparring partners based on specific parameters and submit to the potential sparring partner a request to setup sparring

subsections.title: Process
information: - Utilized React Native and Redux to create a minium viable cross platform mobile application product.
- Stategizing and scoping the core features necessary to meet user criteria.

- Mapped out user stories, and establishing how to keep the experience simple and direct so that any user may install the app and get to fulfilling the task they sought out to do as seamless as possible.
- The app implements invitation features to extends interest of using the app to other users.
- Scaling for future features of the app also placed under consideration
User flow for two  types of users.
- Users would need to query information about other users based on certain criteria, as well create and edit spar request forms sent to other others users.
Planned out an optimal database structure necessary to delivery content to the UI.
- Utilized Firebase to handle real-time data store as well as user authentication
- Critical image assets designed to support the user interface
Created a brand logo with supported typography, and color scheme that would suit the user interface.

subsections.title: Current Project Status
information: Project placed on hold for now but feel free to follow or contact to stay up to date on the project or show support
